Reviews.Title: GE X5 14 Megapixel 15x Wide Optical Zoon 2.7 TFT LCD
Reviews.Author: MarshallAZ "Marshall A Kear"
Reviews.Content: This particular camera is your basic bridge camera the photos come out clear but also has a high dynamic range function to bring out those dark photos. For 14 mega pixels and all the options, the zoom is not that great so in a sense for a budget camera it is well worth the money. I also use a tripod that I bought separately. The camera is compact has a good bright flash for dark photos it comes with 1. 5 volt alkaline batteries. However, I use rechargeable batteries. In all if you're just starting abroad with basic photography, this is a step higher than a point and shoot camera, the photos without zoom come out clear in the daylight and night. In a total for the money and photo quality, I give it five-star rating.

ProductInfo.Name: GE X5 14 Megapixel 15x Wide Optical Zoom 2.7 TFT LCD - Midnight Blue [Electronics]
